summary:
The Government of Sierra Leone is requested to conclude a status-of-forces agreement within 30 days. The establishment of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission, Human Rights Commission, and Commission for the Consolidation of Peace is urged. The Government of Sierra Leone is called upon to exercise full control over the exploitation of natural resources. Contributions to the multi-donor trust fund for disarmament, demobilization, and reintegration are welcomed and urged.

The Government of Sierra Leone is called upon to establish professional and accountable national police and armed forces. Urgent and substantial assistance to the people of Sierra Leone and sustained assistance for peace-building, reconstruction, and development are reiterated. The Secretary-General is requested to report to the Council every 45 days. The Council decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
